ygData.subject: Re: Fiery Avenger really that good?
ygData.msgSnippet: agreed -- my cleric can beat any melee class (almost):  flash of light, root, smite, smite, smite, etc... can t touch me.  Died once though, my flash of light
ygData.messageBody:
agreed -- my cleric can beat any melee class (almost): flash of light,
root, smite, smite, smite, etc... can't touch me. Died once though, my
flash of light was resisted, and a SK HTed me. OUCH

-----Original Message-----
From: kurt walther [mailto:itzkurt@...]
Sent: Friday, January 29, 1999 6:39 AM
To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] Fiery Avenger really that good?


From: kurt walther <itzkurt@...>

Simon wrote:
>
> From: Simon <simon21@...>
>
> a necro vs a monk would be a great fight but i still think the monk would
win. unless on the pvp
> server. because the necro's pets don't work in duels (last i checked)
the only server they work
> on is the pvp server. do necro's get root? i don't remember if they do
then they could own monks
> but i dont' think they get it.

I assure you the necro would win. I've watched it with my own eyes. A
lvl 30 necro in unrest one day spanked EVERY person who stepped up to
them.. with over half life left after each fight. Monks didn't do very
good at all against the necro. Who needs root when you have fear.
Necros own in pvp. Find out for yourself by fighting one. You'll get
owned. Melee classes don't do so hot in pvp.
